DoorethyL0_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0_0.text: Oh!!! A new one! Hi hi~~~! ^^

DoorethyL0_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0_1.text: I'm Doorethy! I-I'm supposed to stop you but... that sounds like work... vv

DoorethyL0_2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0_2.text: How about a deal? Solve all my puzzles and I'll handle your siblings!!! :3

DoorethyL0_3.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0_3.text: ORRR~~ kill everyoneeee with cold blooddd!!!!! ^^
